channel.title: Npc help!
channel.description: Can some one help me, i wanna edit what this npc says at home, i'm using oldkoscape's source, and i'm wondering how to edit what the npc's say, ok, please helP? :o

item.title: Npc help!
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

go into NPCHandler.JAVA and and press Ctrl+F and then in the box typ in what the npc are saying

you should see this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 425) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "edit what the npc's say in this line! make shure not to delete the " or you get errors"; } }

Read full topic
